subject: Re: [junit] How to test local interface in ejb

messageBody:

>i am having difficult in writing test cases for local interfaces
>(bean,local,localhome).If any body has worked on this please mail.

Since you cannot test an interface, I assume that you want to test the implementation class.

Start here: http://junit.blog-city.com If you find it useful, then leave a comment and I'll try to write some more.

Take care.
